<h3 id="X36991">X(36991) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: REFLECTIONS-OF-X(7)-IN-(A,B,C) TO REFLECTIONS-OF-(A,B,C)-IN-X(7)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^6-4*(b+c)*a^5+(5*b^2-6*b*c+5*c^2)*a^4-(5*b^2+6*b*c+5*c^2)*(b-c)^2*a^2+4*(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(36991) = 2*X(3)-3*X(5817) = 4*X(3)-5*X(18230) = 3*X(4)-2*X(5805) = 5*X(4)-4*X(18482) = 3*X(4)-X(36996) = 4*X(5)-3*X(21151) = 3*X(7)-4*X(5805) = 5*X(7)-8*X(18482) = X(7)-4*X(31672) = 3*X(7)-2*X(36996) = 2*X(40)-3*X(5686) = 2*X(5759)-3*X(6172) = 2*X(5768)-3*X(5809) = 4*X(5779)-3*X(6172) = 5*X(5805)-6*X(18482) = X(5805)-3*X(31672) = 6*X(5817)-5*X(18230) = 2*X(18482)-5*X(31672) = 12*X(18482)-5*X(36996) = 6*X(31672)-X(36996)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(36992)</p>
<p>X(36991) lies on these lines:
{1,18222}, {2,1750}, {3,5817}, {4,7}, {5,21151}, {8,144}, {9,20}, {10,2951}, {30,5759}, {33,18623}, {40,5686}, {57,10392}, {84,1445}, {142,3091}, {149,152}, {189,36101}, {329,10431}, {355,31797}, {376,31658}, {381,31657}, {382,5762}, {388,14100}, {390,515}, {479,11028}, {497,8581}, {518,962}, {527,3543}, {944,8236}, {946,11038}, {952,12630}, {954,4313}, {990,5222}, {991,5308}, {1001,5731}, {1156,2829}, {1490,5703}, {1541,10004}, {1699,5542}, {1709,3219}, {1837,31391}, {2094,13243}, {2346,11496}, {2478,10861}, {2550,6925}, {2551,15587}, {3059,5815}, {3358,5825}, {3436,25722}, {3475,7965}, {3522,21153}, {3523,6666}, {3529,21168}, {3562,15811}, {3575,7717}, {3600,10864}, {3627,5843}, {3839,6173}, {4292,10398}, {4293,15299}, {4294,15298}, {4295,18412}, {4297,11106}, {4298,30330}, {4301,9797}, {4312,18391}, {4321,14986}, {4326,21628}, {5056,20195}, {5220,6253}, {5226,5658}, {5273,7580}, {5296,36706}, {5435,13226}, {5556,15909}, {5572,11037}, {5698,16112}, {5704,6245}, {5729,12246}, {5735,12649}, {5744,36002}, {5749,13727}, {5766,29007}, {5781,27382}, {5784,6836}, {5785,12572}, {5811,6851}, {5842,36976}, {5845,36990}, {5851,9803}, {5856,10724}, {5918,26040}, {5927,18228}, {6001,7672}, {6260,21617}, {6261,30284}, {6987,18540}, {7319,10307}, {7676,11500}, {7677,12114}, {7679,18242}, {7971,11526}, {9534,10443}, {9776,11220}, {9779,31019}, {9785,9856}, {9841,17580}, {9851,12577}, {9943,11024}, {10106,10384}, {10442,10449}, {10728,12247}, {11025,12675}, {11495,18253}, {12618,29611}, {14647,30295}, {14872,34784}, {15071,30329}, {17582,31805}, {17768,37001}, {18483,30340}, {21454,30304}, {24644,30331}</p>
<p>
X(36991) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {144, 3146}, {3062, 5691}<br>
X(36991) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (4, 31672), (7, 4), (20, 9), (390, 11372), (2951, 10), (4326, 21628), (5698, 16112), (5759, 5779), (6987, 18540), (12669, 5728), (12680, 5572), (15071, 30329), (20059, 5735), (31671, 3627), (34784, 14872), (35514, 355), (36996, 5805)<br>
X(36991) = anticomplement of X(5732)<br>
X(36991) = X(8)-Beth conjugate of-X(2951)<br>
X(36991) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 5817, 18230), (4, 9799, 938), (4, 36996, 5805), (7, 5809, 938), (5658, 8727, 5226), (5759, 5779, 6172), (5805, 36996, 7), (7675, 8232, 5703)<br>
</p>
